rooms.description: The living-dining area is designed to maximize openness and connection with the garden. Large floor-to-ceiling windows allow abundant natural light.
The kitchen is designed for a tight budget with economical appliances and efficient workflow. It opens to the living area.
A guest room designed with simplicity in mind. Floor-to-ceiling windows are used for natural ventilation and lighting.
The bathroom is designed to be economical while maintaining Vastu principles in its placement.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Door connecting the kitchen to the living-dining area.

notes.vastu_compliance: The design incorporates natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
notes.garden_integration: Large garden area integrated with open spaces and abundant window openings.
